title: ASAP Rocky claims he's a sex addict
text:
ASAP Rocky has revealed he's a sex addict.

TMZ report that the musician, 31, said he became addicted to sex at junior high school and that he had his first orgy aged 13 - below the legal age of consent.

The admission came during an interview with Power 105.1 DJ Angie Martinez on her show, Untold Stories of Hip Hop, in which he said threesomes are 'normal to him.'
